input.description: The adapter name. The default is BDAActorAdapter.

items The items XML used to peform an operation within the BMC Database Automation.
Value takes the form:
<items> <item> <target>..</target> <job-status>.. </job-status> <detail>..<detail> </item> </items>

connection parameters [optional] The XML containing the metadata needed by the adapter to connect to the target.
Value takes the form:
<connection-parameters> <use-ssl-certificate></use-ssl-certificate> <install-certificate></install-certificate> <allow-unsigned-certificate></allow-unsigned-certificate> <passphrase></passphrase> </connection-parameters>

Mutual Authentication parameters [optional] The XML containing the information needed by the adapter to perform a client authentication.
Value takes the form:
<mutual-authentication-parameters> <signature-properties mode="ket-data"> <private-key-data></private-key-data> <certificate-data></certificate-data> </signature-properties> </mutual-authentication-parameters>
<mutual-authentication-parameters> <signature-properties mode="ketstore"> <keystore-file></keystore-file> <keystore-password></keystore-password> <alias></alias> </signature-properties> </mutual-authentication-parameters>
<mutual-authentication-parameters> <signature-properties mode="ket-files"> <private-key-file></private-key-file> <certificate-file></certificate-file> </signature-properties> </mutual-authentication-parameters>

documentation.description: This operation Approves or rejects a Job
